required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Treatment of Thoracic Aortic Aneurysms and Dilatation in Combination With Tricuspid and Bicuspid Aortic Valves.
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Study of Diagnosis and Treatment of Thoracic Aortic Aneurysms and Dilatation in Combination With Tricuspid and Bicuspid Aortic Valves.

lead_sponsor.agency: Tomsk National Research Medical Center of the Russian Academy of Sciences

clinical_study.source: Tomsk National Research Medical Center of the Russian Academy of Sciences

brief_summary.textblock: Clarification of indications for surgical correction in patients with borderline expansion of the ascending aorta

detailed_description.textblock: Expanding indications for surgical treatment of patients with borderline values of the ascending aorta

secondary_outcome.measure: increasing the diameter of the ascending aorta
secondary_outcome.description: increasing the diameter of the ascending aorta more than 55 mm

arm_group.description: Healthy patients with normal aortic dimensions
patients with ascending aortic dilation 45-55, tricuspid aortic valves operated on

arm_group.arm_group_label: ascending aortic dilation 45-55, non operated on
arm_group.description: patients with ascending aortic dilation 45-55, tricuspid aortic valves non operated

intervention.arm_group_label: ascending aortic dilation 45-55, non operated on

study_pop.textblock: Patients with computed tomography-diagnosed ascending aortic dilation greater than 45 mm, less than 55 mm with tricuspid aortic valve compared to patients with bicuspid aortic valve and healthy volunteers

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Extension of the ascending aorta less than 55 mm
2. Tricuspid Aortic Valves.
3. Extension of the ascending aorta more than 45 mm
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Age less 45 years
2. Age more 75 years
3. Multiple organ failure
4. oncological disease

overall_official.affiliation: Tomsk National Research Medical Center of the Russian Academy of Sciences

facility.name: Tomsk National Research Medical Center of the Russian Academy of Sciences

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Tomsk National Research Medical Center of the Russian Academy of Sciences
